attributes.action: The queen to step in and prevent democracy being lost in a second in\out vote.
attributes.additional_details:
A second in\out vote tells the public the political powers in this country ignore the common person, and is telling the people, you did not vote how we in government wanted, we will keep voting until you give us the vote we want.


Democracy must live on in this country.


52% voted to leave, this must be respect.

Brexit must happen.
attributes.background:
The people voted to stay in or leave the EU

The Qeen as of head of state is to step in and keep democracy alive in this country to prevent any party holding a second leave\remain vote or abandoning the Brexit process. The Queen can force the government to respect the majority vote of this country

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
